price: Yeroo abbaa isaatiifi ummata isaatiin “maal gabbartu?” jedhe.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mādhā taʿbudūna
